blogPost.title: A YouTuber who investigates cold cases found the car of two Tennessee teenagers who went missing 21 years ago submerged in a river. It's at least the fourth discovery by amateur investigators in two months. https://t.co/A5XCWh8kqf
blogPost.author: The New York Times

previous.title: Michael Nesmith, the contemplative, wool-cap-wearing member of the Monkees, has died at 78. He made one of the rock era's first music videos and won the first Grammy Award for video. https://t.co/Ed2OuEMfqr https://t.co/8PssCI3xfu

localize.full_text: モンキーズのメンバーであるマイケル・ネスミスが78歳で亡くなりました。彼はロック時代の最初のミュージックビデオを制作し、ビデオ部門で初めてグラミー賞を受賞しました。 https://t.co/Ed2OuEMfqr https://t.co/8PssCI3xfu
迈克尔-内斯密斯，这位沉思的、戴着羊毛帽的Monkees乐队成员，已经去世，享年78岁。他制作了摇滚时代最早的音乐视频之一，并赢得了第一个格莱美视频奖。https://t.co/Ed2OuEMfqr https://t.co/8PssCI3xfu
邁克爾-內斯密斯，這位沉思的、戴着羊毛帽的Monkees樂隊成員，已經去世，享年78歲。他製作了搖滾時代最早的音樂視頻之一，並贏得了第一個格萊美視頻獎。https://t.co/Ed2OuEMfqr https://t.co/8PssCI3xfu
